author: fwyzard
body:
**This PR is a work in progress** - it will be submitted only once all the triggers have been integrated

#### PR description:

Integrate the triggers forming the baseline Phase 2 HLT menu.

The common reconstruction configuration is based on
  - the Tracking v6.1 baseline configuration
  - the TICL v3 configuration


#### PR validation:

None yet.
title: Phase 2 HLT menu targetting 7.510 cms
